title: Microfinance and Social Ties (Becky Yang-Hsu)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: In this segment of The Annex, we interview Becky Yang Hsu of Georgetown University about her new book, Borrowing Together: Microfinance and Cultivating Social Ties with Cambridge University Press.
